description: General definitions for experiment data, not specific to any experimental method or parser.

metaInfos.description: This section contains information about the stored data.
metaInfos.name: section_data

metaInfos.description: The name of the repository, where the data is stored.
metaInfos.name: data_repository_name

metaInfos.description: An URL to the repository, where the data is stored.
metaInfos.name: data_repository_url

metaInfos.description: An URL to an image file that contains a preview.
metaInfos.name: data_preview_url
